Package ball.util.ant.taskdefs

Interface ConfigurableAntTask

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AntTaskMixIn
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PatternTask, PatternTask.Matches, PatternTask.Split, PreferencesTask, PreferencesTask.Export, StreamTokenizerTask, StreamTokenizerTask.FromString, XPathEvaluateTask
    public interface ConfigurableAntTask
extends AntTaskMixIn
    Provides default Task.init() method to initialize Task attributes from project properties.
    Author:
    Allen D. Ball

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default void configure()
      Default method to configure Task attributes.
      default void init()
      Default implementation for Task subclasses.
